hero-role: A passionate <colored>Full Stack Web Developer</colored> from Argentina
hero-paragraph: I specialize in creating tech solutions, focusing on quality, commitment, and user satisfaction.
about-description: I have always been fascinated by technology and its ability to solve real-world problems. The world of programming allowed me to combine my passion for continuous learning with the satisfaction of creating solutions that make people's lives easier. I love challenges, which has given me great resilience and autonomy. Currently, I am studying Computer Engineering while continuing to grow as a fullstack developer. I am open to new professional opportunities, including full-time, part-time, or internship roles in the IT field.
contact-message: You can contact me anytime via email or using this form.
